articles.title: Bigg Boss 17's first runner up Abhishek Kumar receives a grand welcome by massive crowd at his home town - Times of India
articles.description: Abhishek Kumar, the first runner-up of Bigg Boss 17, receives a grand welcome in his hometown of Chandigarh by a massive crowd. Watch the heartwarming video as the enthusiastic crowd celebrates his success.
